isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, AND 9400 - DESCRIPTION - AIR INTAKES

svcproc.title: AIR INTAKES
svcproc.para: Air intakes are mounted on the left hood side panel on the 5000 SBA (with butterfly hood, optional after August 1994) and 5000 SFA Series.
On 9100, 9200, 9300, and 9400 Models, the air intake is mounted on the left cab cowl side panel.
Air is taken in through the grille, above the front of the radiator on the 5000 SBA (with fiberglass tilt hood, standard after August 1994).
